text: The three people who died in Napa County were found Wednesday in a home that had burned on the 6900 block of State Route 128, said Henry Wofford, spokesman for the Napa County Sheriff‚Äôs Office. https://t.co/ouXFPwyvC4

text: The three victims have not been identified, and officials have not determined their genders or ages, Wofford said. https://t.co/ouXFPwyvC4
